workflow: 1. Navigate to 'Products'. 2. Search for 'Blue Top'. 3. Add to cart. 4. Click 'Continue Shopping'. 5. Search for 'Men Tshirt'. 6. Add to cart. 7. Click 'Continue Shopping'. 8. Search for 'Sleeveless Dress'. 9. Add to cart. 10. Click 'View Cart'. 11. Verify 3 items are in cart. 12. Proceed to Checkout. 13. Click 'Register / Login'. 14. Fill name 'Stress Tester' and email 'stress_test_unique@gmail.com' in Signup. 15. Click 'Signup'. 16. Fill details (Password: 12345, FName: Stress, LName: Test, Address: 123 Street, City: TestVille, State: TX, Zip: 12345, Mobile: 999888777). 17. Click 'Create Account'. 18. Click 'Continue'. 19. Go to Cart. 20. Proceed to Checkout. 21. Verify addresses. 22. Click 'Place Order'. 23. Fill Payment (Name: Card, No: 123, CVC: 321, Expiry: 01/2030). 24. Click 'Pay and Confirm Order'. 25. Verify 'Order Placed!' message.
